author: Stereogum
title: Banksy Opens Palestine Hotel With Original Music By Massive Attack, Trent Reznor, & Flea
text: Banksy's latest project is the Walled Off Hotel , a fully functioning art hotel in the West Bank city of Bethlehem. With windows overlooking the wall separating the Palestinian territory from Israel, Banksy is billing it as "the hotel with the worst view in the world." In addition to a gallery curated by Dr. More Â»
